ARABIC: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُوا۟ وَأَصْلَحُوا۟ وَبَيَّنُوا۟ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَتُوبُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَأَنَا ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: except for those who make tawba and put things right and make things clear. I turn towards them. I am the Ever-Returning, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But those who repent and reform and proclaim (the truth), are forgiven, for I am forgiving and merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: I, however, will forgive those of them who repent of it, mend their ways and make own what they were concealing: for I am very generous in accepting repentance and showing mercy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: However, I shall accept the repentance of those of them who repent for their sins, reform their manners, and preach the truth; I am All-forgiving and All-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Except those who repent and do reform and disclose (the truth) – so I will accept their repentance; and I only am the Most Acceptor of Repentance, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Except those who repent and do righteous deeds, and openly declare (the truth which they concealed). These, I will accept their repentance. And I am the One Who accepts repentance, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Except those who repent and amend and make manifest (the truth), these it is to whom I turn (mercifully); and I am the Oft-returning (to mercy), the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: save such as repent and make amends, and show clearly -- towards them I shall turn; I turn, All-compassionate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Except those who repent and amend and make manifest (the truth). These it is toward whom I relent. I am the Relenting, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But from those who repent and mend their ways and make known the truth, I will certainly accept their repentance: I am the Ever Relenting, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Save those that repent and amend, and make manifest the truth I these it is toward whom I relent. And I am the Relenting, the Merciful!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: except such as repent, make amends, and clarify—those I shall pardon, and I am the All-clement, the All-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Except those who repent and make amends and openly declare (the Truth): To them I turn; for I am Oft-returning, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Except those who repent and do righteous deeds, and openly declare (the truth which they concealed). These, I will accept their repentance. And I am the One Who accepts repentance, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: except those who repent, and mend (their deeds) and clarify. Those I shall accept them. I am the Receiver of repentance, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Except those who repent, and reform, and proclaim. Those—I will accept their repentance. I am the Acceptor of Repentance, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Except for those who repent and correct themselves and make evident [what they concealed]. Those - I will accept their repentance, and I am the Accepting of repentance, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:160] Except those that repent, turning back from such [deeds], and make amends, in their actions, and show clearly, what they were concealing — them I shall turn [relenting], accepting their repentance; I am the Relenting, the Merciful, to believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Except such of them as repent) from Judaism (and amend) worship Allah alone without ascribing to Him any partners (and make manifest) the traits and description of Muhammad. (These it is towards whom I relent) overlook their past transgressions. (I am the Relenting) towards those who repent, (the Merciful) towards him who dies in a state of repentance.
